title: A Coppy of Generall Lesley's letter to Sir Iohn Svckling with Sir Iohn Sucklings answer to his letter.
author: Newark, David Leslie, Baron, d. 1682.
notes: "A pamphlet concerning Suckling's flight from England after the discovery of the 'first army plot.' Probably fictitious"--NUC pre 1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
